#!/usr/bin/env ruby require ENV["TM_SUPPORT_PATH"] + "/lib/tm/executor" require ENV["TM_SUPPORT_PATH"] + "/lib/tm/save_current_document" require ENV["TM_SUPPORT_PATH"] + "/lib/escape" TextMate.save_current_document TextMate::Executor.make_project_master_current_document flags = [] flags << ENV["TM_MAKE_FLAGS"] unless ENV["TM_MAKE_FLAGS"].nil? flags << ENV["TM_MAKE_TARGET"] unless ENV["TM_MAKE_TARGET"].nil? ENV["TM_DISPLAYNAME"] = ENV["TM_MAKE_TARGET"].nil? ? "default" : ENV["TM_MAKE_TARGET"] # makefiles are always in the project directory. #Dir.chdir(ENV["TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY"]) unless ENV["TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY"].nil? Dir.chdir("/Users/duff/Oak/avian") TextMate::Executor.run("make", flags, :verb => "Making") do |line, type| if line =~ /^(.*?):(?:(\d+):)?\s*(.*?)$/ and not $1.nil? and File.exists?($1) "#{htmlize $3}
\n" end end
